title: Warhammer - Forge of War [BigBonedNinja][h33t]
description:
Warhammer - Forge of War (Variants Covers Included)
[IMG]http://img513.imageshack.us/img513/5580/2qjiuipec5.jpg[/IMG]

[quote]Forge of War is a 5-issue American comic book limited series from Boom! Studios, written by Dan Abnett and Ian Edginton.  Set in the low-fantasy world of Warhammer Fantasy, it follows several characters of the Averland army, a country within the Empire, and their conflict against the forces of Chaos.[/quote]

Thanks to all the scanners involved.

IF YOU LIKE THE BOOK, THEN BUY THE COMICS OR THE TRADES. SUPPORT YOUR LOCAL COMIC BOOK STORES AND THE INDEPENDENT PUBLISHERS!!!

Please keep seeding. :D
